website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's simple and functional Keyboard Folio offers a keyboard plus iPad protection, but it's too thick for its own good.
cons: Nowhere near as thin or light as Logitech's Ultrathin Keyboard Cover, and yet it's more expensive

customer_reviews.title: I bought more than a few of these. Each ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought more than a few of these. Each time, same problem. After about a year (or less) several of the keyboard keys began to not work when typing a word or phrase. Very disturbing and inconvenient, especially during important meetings or sending quick messages.
customer_reviews.author: D. Deane

customer_reviews.title: can take a beating
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard can take a beating, which is why I bought it. the Bluetooth is easily connected and the tilt is perfect for me. I rarely think about it.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new keyboard for my IPad and this one fits perfectly! Delivery was very prompt. the item is very sturdy and definitely worth the price! Great Seller and I will definitely recommend this Seller to everone. Thanks! K
customer_reviews.author: KPALO

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. Pairs easily with the IPAD. Had one before until I ruined it and spilled a cup of coffee across the keyboard. So, remember it's not moisture proof. But, fit, form, and function are excellent. A very nice keyboard to use. Keys spaced nicely. Much better than typing on a screen. Battery life is long in between charges. And, I ive mine daily for many hours at a time. Can't say enough things about this item. Would I buy again? Absolutely!!!! Even offers some protection for the tablet. Fits well too.
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet keyboard I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best keyboard/case combination I have ever used, and believe me, I've burned through a few of them. This keyboard is incredibly well built -- a huge difference from the really cheap feel of most keyboards. It never fails to wake up when I tap a key a couple of times (a problem with some other keyboards). The outer case is very sturdy, and it doesn't show dirt like many do. I'm not sure why they felt it necessary to put that huge tag hanging off the front, but if it ever really bugs me, I'll just cut it off with a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Wordwrkr

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This Logitech keyboard case is great. It fits my 2nd generation iPad just right. The magnetic stand keeps the iPad in exactly the right place when in the keyboard position. I haven't charged it up and connected it to my iPad yet, but I expect it to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: This wouldn't connect with the ipad. This was a cheaper made version,
customer_reviews.text: This wouldn't connect with the ipad. This was a cheaper made version, cheap material and magnetic strip not very strong. Ended up buying the same model from another retailer (at a higher price), but it was made from better material, connected immediately and magnetic works well. Will return today.
customer_reviews.author: The Noil Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Typing with this now. I've had it for a while now and has made my life so much easier. Didn't want to boot up the computer all the time to send emails, search the internet etc., because I hated using the keyboard on the iPad. I can type much faster on a real keyboard. Bluetooth lasts a long time. Viewing level is perfect. That Apple Smart Cover is worthless with it's low viewing level and coming apart at the magnetic seam all the time. My son has the same Logitech keyboard for his iPad mini. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: momx2

customer_reviews.title: Not for the ipad 4th generation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this keyboard for the IPad 4th generation (A1458), as is described in the ad. It is not for the 4th generation, but is for an ipad Mini. It is too small, and doesn’t fit. Either they made a mistake with the shipping, or else the ad is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: I am used to it so I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I always seem to drop coffee or juice at breakfast on the keyboard, which is not good for it. In fact, some keys will not work after being wet. Also, being a mechanical device, I usually get 2 to 3 years out of each keyboard/cover. I am so used to this product that I keep buying replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Sudburyguy

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was exactly what I was looking for, and I love it! I use it all the time. Highly recommended! I'd say the only thing I don't like is that the home screen button and the exclamation point share the same space on the keyboard, so often I find myself exiting when I'm trying to exclaim. Otherwise, keyboard works really well and I love that I can easily turn it on and off, and flip the iPad around to use without the keyboard without having to remove it. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Hlang

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described however I will say My only issue with it is the weight of the iPad when it’s put in it causes it to want to fall over backwards. The case itself is very light weight, which is good and someways but not so good in others. Everything works just as it should! Just wish it had more weight in the keyboard area so it wouldn’t tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: layout too weird
customer_reviews.text: Thu 5/15/2014 7:19 am. I found this keyboard/case surpassingly cute but really not nearly as good as my previous keyboard/case -- which I got at Brookstone for a comparable price. I couldn't ever type a complete sentence without fouling-up at the weird placement of the left-hand keys; apparently my "muscle memory" refuses to deal with a keyboard that has the "A" on the edge -- and of course all the other left-hand keys get misplaced over one. ... I tried; and failed; and returned to the older keyboard which isn't nearly as cute but much easier to type on even *though* it has more-miniature keys.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Owen

customer_reviews.title: keyboard layout not so good
customer_reviews.text: The layout of the keyboard is a bit squirrelly. It is like a standard QWERTY keyboard, except that the keys on the left hand side start with a fat "A" that doubles as a cap lock when you press a function key. The numbers are off a little, so when I try to type on it using my keyboard skills acquired over the last 60 years, the offset of the numbers keys means that I type the wrong numbers and/or hit the kill switch button on the upper left. I like the case, I hate the keyboard layout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects and perfoms.
customer_reviews.text: Black, sturdy, fabric feel (not slippery!) Keys feel good and holds a charge through my whole day, though I'm not a constant user. Glad I purchased it. Makes a stand, if you like. Really makes my 4th generation iPad a useful part of my computing armada.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Why keys would quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product late October 2018. Yesterday, Feb. 7th, the letter o on my keyboard quick working. Have not been able to research any reason for this problem. All other letters work fine; took cap off and checked underneath and all appears to be fine. Unfortunately, the return window closed in November of 2018. May look for another brand keyboard to replace this current logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Gen 1 ipad but works fine!
customer_reviews.text: My ipad is slightly smaller than the portfolio holding area. Nevertheless,I keep it from sliding by adding some tape to the back of the ipad. It synched up quickly, no issues and and works as designed. I'm very pleased with the replacement portfolio.
customer_reviews.author: senora amiga

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard/cover is very well constructed and protects the iPad very well. The keyboard is very easy to utilize and has a natural feel to the keystrokes. Have had no problem synching the keyboard and the iPad. Only concern on that line is every time I turn the iPad on (after it has been off for a while, not sleeping), I have to go into the bluetooth in controls and select the keyboard to get the connection. That, I feel is an idiosynchrosy of Apple, not the keyboard. This cover/keyboard does add some weight to the iPad, but that is a plus in my opinion as it keeps it from sliding around on you on surfaces. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy, and it broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: One thing that I didn't realize when I bought this...it's a brick! It has a thick plastic cover where the iPad is inserted, so it's bulkier, and the whole thing was noticeably heavier than my last keyboard folio (a Zagg Profolio, which I liked but would no longer charge). I mentioned that this is plastic, not metal. Not sure if that's a factor, but within a week of using it, the plastic covering the keyboard keys started to separate from the bottom of the case. Not good. This is the first item I've ever returned to Amazon, but honestly, it made me not want to carry my iPad around.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Im Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a gem! A few adjustments to make for a smaller keyboard but not a big deal at all. Works great, iPad seems so safe and I like it so much that when a good friend admired mine, i ordered her one for Christmas. Great customer service from Seller and my friend is thrilled w hers as well. Great product & long battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Jan

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the description carefully. This keyboard has full-sized keys but not a full-sized style keyboard. To Tab, two keys must be pressed at the same time and that didn't work for me. I bought a refurbished keyboard and one of the keys fell off and I lost it. The Tab function was the determining factor for the return, not the lost key. Not every product is perfect but their customer service was excellent and responsive. Hence, the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: JimmerSD

customer_reviews.title: Thanks LW Outlet for selling us our 2nd Logitech case in 2 weeks - way better than used  labeled 'good'
customer_reviews.text: Best all around case - sturdy yet foldable, super protective and comfortable. Nice high tech black appearance. It looks and feels like a nylon or some high end fabric that Calvin Klein sells for its rugged urban jackets, It's that nice. I wish I could use it to replace a true keyboard but it's not going to be that good given its size. It works well and functions for an email reply or simple note like this and more comfortable than typing on the tablet's glass panel.
customer_reviews.author: michiganlakes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Tried to do a lot of research before I bought this, but you still never know. This keyboard is exactly what I wanted. It has a full keyboard with all of the letters, easily understandable alternate keys, easy to use instructions. The only thing I don't like, which is me and not the keyboard, is the TAB key needs to be engaged with a control key and I often forget and end up closing out of a screen on my iPad. That said, it offers great protection for my iPad and has a magnetized groove to hold up the iPad screen like a laptop. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I wouldn't have to lug around my 17" laptop & it has been awesome! I'll admit that I went to Best Buy to check these out in person before I ordered it here. I was really glad I did that so I could see that this one was better than some that were priced much higher. The only thing it doesn't have is the backlit keyboard which I don't really care about. It fully protects the iPad & works great. It's a little heavy but nothing compared to my giant cumbersome laptop! Im happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bellaflora

customer_reviews.title: I hope you might have a better experience. As far as function
customer_reviews.text: I have used this keyboard for about a month now, and sadly, laid it aside. My reasons were it was just too heavy to carry around, and the keys were a little difficult for me to use (particularly when trying to use an "a" since it has a longer keypad than the normal letters). My fingers just wouldn't adjust to typing "on-the-fly" thinking it was a tab key or a cap lock key, sliding off to the adjacent key ("s"). I hope you might have a better experience. As far as function, it was good. Just these two irritations that made me give a 3 out of 5 for my experience.
customer_reviews.author: pdanymail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is the second keyboard I have bought. The first one, also a Logitech, stood separately with a magnetic tape strip and attached to the ipad to act as a cover. However the magnetic tape strip came off so every time I stood up the ipad on the keyboard it fell off in the middle of typing. This folio is bulkier and heavier but is WAY better for staying upright and has bigger keys more like a typewriter If you are a typist you will love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Decent keyboard folio with good feel, but the layout takes some getting used ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent keyboard folio with good feel, but the layout takes some getting used to and you have to manually turn it on and off. The Logitech Type+ case is better in every way, with a more standard layout and auto on/off, but says it's for 4th Generation iPads only. For 2nd and 3rd generation, you may be stuck with this inferior model, although I'm not certain if the issue is fit or compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Choi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for typing, but needs portrait mode for reading.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome! It's just like typing on a regular keyboard. I love the size of the keys and the spacing. Your touch typing will need to be adjusted but you do get used to it. One down side is the weight, adding a keyboard to an already heavy iPad makes the combined weight a lot for a handle held device. I wish it had the ability to turn the screen to portrait for reading as the iPad is far to heavy to hold collapsed and read.
customer_reviews.author: Talisa

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend Logiteck
customer_reviews.text: First one lasted a reasonable time. Second failed in what should be warranty period, although "Logitech support" which supposedly defines the warranty, will not open. Supplier states "beyond return period". I would not recommend Logitech purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome B Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. I reach for my iPad much more now that I have a real keyboard. It is a real competitor to my laptop because I can key-in/'type' with all my fingers! No more 'hunt and peck' on a keyboard image using only two digits. It makes the laptop heavier in weight, naturally, so consider its main use. If it will be used primarily to read, for example, it may not be worth the trade-off or consider the alternative -- resting it on your lap, armrest or tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer, great purchase for students!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Not too expensive either. I use this for school- they require iPads instead of traditional textbooks- and it has pretty much replaced my laptop now that I can both use the touch screen and type. I write papers all the time in the Word Document app. Also very easy to send out emails and switch languages and do loads of other functions! Makes it a lot easier to type, I never use the touch keyboard on the iPad anymore. This is a very sturdy and efficient case that is fairly easy to keep clean even in school and in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bullock

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste to purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste to purchase. It literally doesn't fit the iPad 4th generation so that was a bad description in the description box. Plus, the keyboard is definitely not in a new/like new condition because there are black smudges all over. And the keyboard doesn't even work. I wished I could've gave this purchase zero stars. The only good thing was fast shipping, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected, except no function
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described and on time, but never functioned as expected. Bluetooth appeared to work fine, and would pair with iPad, but keyboard never actually input any typing; everything would pair as expected, but no letters ever appeared in any app when keys were pressed. Was refurbished, so malfunction always a possibility. Had to return. However, had it worked properly, I expect I would have enjoyed using it. A bit chunky, but protects both back and front of iPad when closed, and isn't hideous. Fabric looked nice and didn't seem like it would stain easily, but I didn't have it long enough to test that.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Like this Folio
customer_reviews.text: The folio is on the heavy size if you are used to a light-weight iPad all by itself. It does turn off the iPad display when closed as long as you "line up the corners" when you close it. Otherwise, we discovered the display stays on. The size is comfortable, although the keyboard is smaller than a regular desktop or typewriter keyboard...but larger than the usual laptop keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: AZ golfer

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and provides good protection for my iPad
customer_reviews.text: This product has all the attributes I was looking for in an iPad case. It's very sturdy and provides good protection for my iPad. I never had a keyboard with my other case, so I am really enjoying the keyboard. I love the magnetic holder that props up the iPad in order to use the keyboard. My only disappointment with it is that it only came in black. I would have loved a brown case. I would definitely recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. It's great quality and the magnets let the ipad click into place just above the keyboard so it makes the perfect miniature computer. The keys are regular size although some of them seem to be a little spaced out so at times you make typos because your fingers are used to being on different keys. It's pretty easy to adapt to though. Overall, this is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: What a great accessory. My daughter is so happy with the keyboard cover. She's carrying her iPad around now instead of her laptop. Pairs easily, battery lasts a long time. It's a little bulky but that was expected. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Random Geek

customer_reviews.title: Space bar sticks don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this 2 months. The space bar started sticking during the first week I had it, then it got better, so I kept it. Now I can't return it and the space bar is sticking obnoxiously again. Otherwise a nice keyboard, except no 'tab' function without pressing 2 keys at once. I like the tab function and this one is not workable. Can't recommend if the spacebar stops working and no access to seller for a replacement!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Logitech because I like their keyboards. This keyboard will not disappoint you with its real keys and nice action. I also like the magnetic iPad holder that maintains the tablet position, keeps the folio closed and is also a switch for the iPad. Overall, the folio seems rugged enough to protect the iPad from most accidents (fortunately, I haven't given it a severe test yet). I also like the nylon covering as it resists scratches and scuffs and continues to look nice after several weeks of daily use in my job.
customer_reviews.author: Double Ott Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted almost a year. Put new battery in worked a week now it will not cover to iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Maynerd

customer_reviews.title: Logitech wireless Bluetooth keyboard for iPad 4
customer_reviews.text: Logitech Bluetooth keyboard is easy to pair with your iPad, and very easy to navigate the keyboard. It includes function keys for editing documents. It runs for approximately one month on a single charge, depending upon how many consecutive i hours one uses it. The keyboard also charges relatively quickly. It is a grant purchase for less than 4100.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn L. Gerardi

customer_reviews.title: Best ipad case I've use thus far
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than other types and the keys are better-spaced for us old-timey touch typists. A few keys such as the tab are not where you'd expect but by far this is the best I've had in terms of function, appearance, and durability. I throw it in the saddle bag of my Harley when touring the desert West with no other electronics so I can email and teach online at motels at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Priestess

customer_reviews.title: not happy with the keyboard layout
customer_reviews.text: not happy with the keyboard layout. was alien to the keys and must use a function key to use tab. would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack I.

customer_reviews.title: FOOL ME ONCE
customer_reviews.text: Buy a different brand. This one did not warn me that they idea of qwerty was to put the 'a' in a different location -- cannot be reached using your normal typing skills. And it was too expensive. They should have asked me first, or at least informed me! Crappy, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Stone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I am a teacher use it every day for both work and home and I have only had to charge it once in about 3 months; not because it died, because I had used it for so long and I thought I had better charge it. The keyboard is a little small, but once you are used to it, it's just fine. Very sturdy. When I purchased it I was concerned that I wouldn't be able to use it in portrait, but it does stand up nicely on its side, you just can't use the keyboard. Overall an outstanding product!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Sue

customer_reviews.title: This has been an amazing addition to my iPad and allows me to type ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing addition to my iPad and allows me to type with ease. I love it and since I frequently carry it around in my backpack/book bag it was important that the magnets were strong. The other keyboards that I tried (and returned) did not stay closed which either drained the battery or I was forced to turn the iPad on/off all the time. Although the on/off switch for the keyboard itself is a bit inconveniently located, I have managed to get used to it. The on/off indicator light is very nice. The keys are easy to use and I am enjoying this product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Margie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for an ipad that I will be working off of a lot - emails and registrations - and I love it so far! It was easy to set up and easy to use. The keys feel different from a standard keyboard and a few of the keys are not in the same places but it's not bad at all, I got used to it after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Makes my iPad much more useful
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but it's a little heavy. It definitely more than doubles the weight of my Ipad. Other than that, this works incredibly well and setup couldn't be easier. The battery lasts a really long time on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: The battery lasts for an incredibly long time. Really great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bought it for my kids iPad so that they could do some homeschool work and it's basically become a laptop for the whole family. Much easier to get stuff done. The battery lasts for an incredibly long time. Like, ridiculously long. Haha. Really good product for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric M.

customer_reviews.title: it's solidly built and the magnetic catch part is nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent. It took me some time to get used to the keyboard (and I may never quite get it) because the middle keys are off slightly from normal. It doesn't have a full keyboard.... some keys are combined. So, I often have to look down while typing. Otherwise, it's solidly built and the magnetic catch part is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Charge it once and it is good to go for what seems like days
customer_reviews.text: This functions well as a keyboard and all but replaces a case, too. In fact, I bought a sleeve and it wouldn't fit over the keyboard. It's a bit smaller than a standard keyboard, of course, but I got used to it fairly quickly. The battery life is stellar. Charge it once and it is good to go for what seems like days, although I don't use my iPad all day, every day. Overall, a great product that will make your iPad all the more functional and enjoyable to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kielsun

customer_reviews.title: I made several people happy with this new case
customer_reviews.text: I made several people happy with this new case. By far better quality than ZAGG. I am glad I made the switch because this product has impressed me and will definitely consider when I have to replace the other iPad keyboards. I should of known, Logitech has by far better products than most competitors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it folds
customer_reviews.text: It's great for typing, or for folding over onto the keyboard. Some cases fold in such a way that when you're not using the keyboard, the keyboard is folded underneath, but the keys can be pressed accidentally. This case folds hides the keyboard between the bottom of the tablet and the back of the case, so the keys are protected. And the outside material is really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through quite a few iPad keyboard cases, and the Logitech is our favorite. This is the second one we have had. (We have kids who also use the iPad. They are rather rough with the case and keyboard.)
customer_reviews.author: The Every Free Chance Reader

customer_reviews.title: A bit thick an bulky but great protection. Magnetic screen prop works great
customer_reviews.text: A bit thick an bulky but great protection. Magnetic screen prop works great. Best feature is that you can fold it back on itself when you are suing the tablet for hand writing , which I do a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Calif

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the model you order matches the product on which it will be used.
customer_reviews.text: While the product was good, I could not use it since I had an iPad mini 4
customer_reviews.author: James K. Meer

customer_reviews.title: ... I gave it a 3 is because for some dumb reason, the mfg
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it a 3 is because for some dumb reason, the mfg, combined the A key with the Caps Lock. Hard to get used to, constantly having to go back and correct because the A does not fall where it should, does one extra key really cost that much that they had to combine 2. The product would be a 5 otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I had higher expectations for Logitech!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first logitech iPad keyboard. When I stupidly left it on an airplane and went to Amazon to replace, this seemed like a good option. I've been disappointed in this one. The screen on my iPad cracked (across the corner) while it was in this case. I carry it in my bike panier, but it did not receive any special abuse to my knowledge. Also, I personally do not like the placement of "home" key in the upper lefthand corner. I often hit in error when I'm typing an email. Then I have to restart the email app, which is waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Topp

customer_reviews.title: Best for editing work on the go or without the laptop.
customer_reviews.text: The Keyboard Folio is a great companion for those who don not want to carray a heavy laptop yet want full functiality typing. Works great with my iPad 4 and the keys are well placed. For those with larger fingers - it might pose a problem though. But for me its just perfect. Pairing with the iPad is effortless and can be done in just a few seconds. Haven't tested how long a single charge will last though. The Keyboard Folio does make your iPad more bulky to cary but that is not a problem when you consider the ease of typing in a real keyboard than the touch keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: bahlung

customer_reviews.title: What the heck!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve ordered 2 of these in the past 4 months and BOTH have stopped working!!
customer_reviews.author: Kem18

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: This product was returned. Showed up with stains as over looks like mold. gross.
customer_reviews.author: Rerun

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one because I trust Logitech and have heard good things about this case
customer_reviews.text: Thick and protective. I bought this one because I trust Logitech and have heard good things about this case.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Worked 6weeks now useless
customer_reviews.text: This was great till the o key stopped working Now worthless Don't buy if u want something for long term!
customer_reviews.author: Fred B

customer_reviews.title: Read it and see
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but find it a bit to heavy. I like the fact that it stands up well and folds away nicely, but they could have chosen a liter weight material to make it more comfortable to open, close and carry. The keyboard is slightly different than my old Logitech keyboard, but I got used to it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Typing irratic, lines deleted, text and spaces inserted on the second day of use
customer_reviews.text: The second day I used it strange actions happened while I typed, like whole lines of type were deleted, text that I had not typed was inserted, and spaces were inserted in the middle of words. I rebooted both devices, reconnected blue tooth, but the errors continued. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite a 5, but close
customer_reviews.text: Worth about 4.75 stars. works well, does what it is suppose to. Would like to see a security strap that holds the two halves together when closed. Even though it is magneticlly closed when not it use it can easily slip and open up causing undue stress on the keyboard or iPad. Over all a great product. i would definately suggest getting this if you have a need for keyboard use with an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: pcoats

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This pad is sturdy and strong. Holds up through water and tear. Caution: This will cause your tablet to weigh more. If you want light weight, you may want to pass on this one. I just bought the iPad Air and can't find a cover this sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Really great keyboard. Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Really great keyboard. Easy to operate. If there could ever be a negative, it is a bit heavy, Other than that, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: reprac

customer_reviews.title: Well made folio
customer_reviews.text: As always, Logitech made a sturdy, reliable product. The screen holder is very snug for my 3G and once it's in, it's tight to remove. The responsive click of the keys is a feature I prefer to a keyboard that is silent.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Thayr

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- keyboard is stable and responsive and pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product -- keyboard is stable and responsive and pairs well with the iPad. It holds the device securely and can be easily placed on the lap for use. Would have appreciated some kind of warning when it needs to be charged ...
customer_reviews.author: A. Lustig

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Returned bc it was obviously previously and replacement one also was used. Beware
customer_reviews.author: STEPHANIE OBRION

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's well made, offers good sturdy protection for the iPad, and has magnetic grips to hold the screen support in place.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Possible problem
customer_reviews.text: I have had this 2 days. Not sure if this is occasionally causing the screen to go blank or back to home while surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Collierville

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect solution . I had used another brand before, which was not comfortable nor very compact or portable , The Logitech has good sized keys, is compact, and very portable. With my iPad attached, it fits easily in my carrying case or can be carried as a unit. I am extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Has turned my iPad 2 into a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy design. It is a bit heavy, but protects the iPad very well. I use it every day. Several people have asked me where I bought it. The iPad 2 is an older model but not into rep[lacing just because a newer model is available. With this Keyboard I'm sure I'll be able to preserve the IPad for years.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for board typing!
customer_reviews.text: It was sent in a timely manner. I always like to type on a keyboard when I use my iPad. I've ordered two in the last four years.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: The return process was easy and customer service was great (thus 3 stars instead ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a fan of the keyboard set up. Some of the buttons were not in the correct spot so on top of the key board being compact, the strange places for some of the keys made me send it back. The return process was easy and customer service was great (thus 3 stars instead of 2).
customer_reviews.author: Freakin_Fab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for previous Logitech keyboard folio case. Makes my iPad look new.
customer_reviews.author: James Downing

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a keyboard case this one is an excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Longitech keyboard I have bought. I bought it to replace one I killed by spilling a milkshake on it. I was thrilled to find the eyboard for IPad 4G was still available. I had had the first on a couple of years and only replaced it because I ruined it. If you are looking for a keyboard case this one is an excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: M. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and nice but not easy to clean off
customer_reviews.text: Porous fabric gets dirty and is not early to clean. The keyboard feels so nice though. Expect 1 or 2 buttons "feel" like they are in a weird spot, if you are used to full sized keyboards. Would recommend though. Seems quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ans

customer_reviews.title: I had another identical Logitech keyboard that worked great--the recent ...
customer_reviews.text: I had another identical Logitech keyboard that worked great--the recent one didn't work with the same iPad 2. Letters were skipped and everything was garbled. I talked to Logitech and they didn't have an answer for me so I returned it--I am not sure I got my money back. Pat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard and Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard for my wife's iPad and she raves about the keyboard action. She also loves that fact that it becomes a stand for the iPad while she is simply browsing or playing games. The construction is solid as is expected from Logitech and is easy to clean when it gets the usual kitchen detritus on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kent L. Weitkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, great seller, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great experience, great product, great seller. I had ordered this product, and was a bit impatient because it hadn't shipped for a few days, but the seller upgraded my shipping speed for free! The product is very good, and overall 5/5 experience.
customer_reviews.author: NJ1021

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement for older Logitech keyboard. Nice touch to the keys!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: The best iPad case, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iPad case BUT I had to return it because it has white interior and will get WAY too dirty. If they change the color to all black, I'd buy two of them.
customer_reviews.author: John Doss

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this item. Barely a month old and the bluetooth keyboard won’t hold a charge. The leather case is fine quality. But, now I’ve got to chase down a keyboard replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P. Zurowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life at low cost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life at low cost. This is my 3rd purchase. When they die - they die. Prior (2) purchases had keyboard failures after a year or so of service. Could be water related as I use the IPad poolside, so possibly use caution when using around water or with wet hands.
customer_reviews.author: rjash10

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard, but it's very heavy and doesn't lock closed
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard, and the battery lasts a long, long time (I've charged it twice in a year), but it's a bit on the heavy side. It also doesn't lock closed, so if you drop it, well....let's just hope it does't fall on an unprotected side.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: ... do that or not) but over all it works pretty fine: )
customer_reviews.text: It disconnects when I havent touched it in a while (dont know if its supposed to do that or not) but over all it works pretty fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Janaé

customer_reviews.title: Like the backspace
customer_reviews.text: The key board is full size but they moved some of the buttons around or made them smaller. Like the backspace. I shine I could get used to it. The case is very thick though. I don't know if I can live with that. But it is the most full sized keyboard on any of the 7 or so covers with a keyboard I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Spherehawk

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy keyboard/case for iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and stable. Design feature even enhances the volume from the speaker. A few unusual positioning in the keyboard was awkward at first but got used to it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate nc

customer_reviews.title: Tested before reviewing
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works great. I have really enjoyed using this on my older IPad. The battery seems to last a long time per charge and the blue tooth connection works great. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: FOLIO CASE
customer_reviews.text: FITS PERFICT GREAT PRICE I HAVE HAD OTHERS THIS ONE IS VERY WELL MADE A BIT HEAVY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Carl Aiello

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I've bought this case, and not just for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first case for me, as I have large fingers, I think, and the full sized keyboard is perfection. My boyfriend used it, got very jealous, and so I bought him one as a surprise. He is a very happy camper!!! Great support if you have it flipped up. Easy to see and feel buttons. It's sooooo worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Like the size of the keys on the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Like the size of the keys on the keyboard. Easy to type. The case is a little flimsy, and doesn't always stay in the upright position with the magnet. Can't beat the price for this case. Would recommend it , but not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn LoBianco

customer_reviews.title: I truly loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I truly loved this product. However, I was very disappointed when one of the keys fell off it. I must also note that is wasn't due to abuse. I am very protective of my electronics, keeping them in foam cases and/or my briefcase except when in use. I would have returned it to amazon for a replacement but of course, the key fell off after about 45 days, two weeks past my returnable timeline.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard and case combo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Nice looking, sturdy and strong magnet to prop up the iPad on your lap. Keyboard is user friendly. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: PTMama

customer_reviews.title: iPad to Laptop Conversion  (Lite)
customer_reviews.text: Makes the iPad feel like a laptop. Screen positions available are minimal but secure. Feels more stable than other keyboard/case options we have tried which seemed flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: californialocal

customer_reviews.title: Great folio
customer_reviews.text: For the Ipad 2. The folio is pretty good. -The keyboard is a bit thick, but well built. -The external shell is a plastic-canvas texture, very nice looking -The Magnet attachment for the Ipad upright position only has one setting, which limits the number of positions.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to put the iPad into it and took no ...
customer_reviews.text: Or rather I should say that my wife loves it. Was easy to put the iPad into it and took no time to having it recognized and operating. She loves it so I do as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sales

product_meta.title: Logitech Keyboard/Cover Case (Folio) for iPad2, iPad (3rd and 4th Generation) - Black
product_meta.description: Enjoy the confidence that comes with this Logitech Keyboard Folio Case for Apple iPad 2/3/4G. This case provides protection for both the front and back of your Apple iPad. The keyboard folio will help to keep your iPad and its touchscreen safe and sound. Each Logitech keyboard case is designed to be flexible and easy to use. It has a magnetic mechanism built into the case itself. The Apple iPad keyboard case comes in black.
feature_bullets: Sleeve folio case for iPad Compatible with iPad 2, 3rd and 4th Generation
Made of black polypropylene that protects from spills and bumps Built-in Bluetooth keyboard for laptop-like typing experience
Keyboard with iPad shortcuts for convenience Magnetic closure for enhanced protection
Long-lasting battery requires charging only once every three months
Wakes iPad on opening case and puts iPad to sleep on closing Enables two iPad positions - tilted for typing and flat for viewing media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars718 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
